| Papers

The paper most surprised me is IoT Goes Nuclear: Creating a ZigBee Chain Reaction by Eyal Ronen, Colin O'Flynn, Adi Shamir and Achi-Or Weingarten.

| Basketball

I am a passionate basketball fan. Liaoning Flying Leopards (wikipidia link), my hometown team in CBA, is my favorite basketball team. I am a Guard-forward (SG/SF) in the court, mostly a Guard. I was an assistant coach of my school SEIEE basketball team.

| Music

I achieved amateur level 10 on electronic keyboard when I was 12.
